text: @SenSchumer Yep. May 16th and you idiots need to open up your Blue states for commerce last month already. You and Gov Cuomo will be charged with mass murder for putting our most 'at-risk' persons residing in nursing homes together with COVID19 persons. #PainJusticeComing
